comment.author: 45586426@N06
comment._content: Grumman AD-6 Skyraider 135370 of VA-115 ‘Arabs’ Modex 508 Tail code NH of Carrier Air Group /Wing Eleven CVG-11 / CVW-11) Curved color decoration on engine, wing and tail tips. Picture may date from 1958 and color decoration may be green. VA-115 was with CVG-11 / CVW-11 from 1958 to 1966 Picture including A-1H 135370 with VA-145 ‘Swordsmen’ as Modex 506: groups.yahoo.com/group/PropNavy/attachments/folder/169689... 137622 NK-512, 135370 NK-506 A-1H VA-145 no date 1967 picture of A-1H 135370: (look for picture with following words below, to view) www.gonavy.jp/bbs2-a1.html A-1H 135370/AH-505 CVA-34 Oriskany (Nov.15, 1967) det.H No.3227 1967 record for A-1H 135370: www.gonavy.jp/CVW16-AH1967.html A-1H 135370 VA-152 Modex 505 June 16 1967 to January 31 1968 CVA-34 USS Oriskany After horrendous losses from both a tragic onboard fire and combat over Vietnam. (information courtesy of Takafumi Hiroe, citizen of Japan and naval aviation historian) The eventual fate of A-1H 135370 is as yet unknown. A very similar pic to the above from the famous Bill Larkins portfolio dated 1957: www.flickr.com/photos/34076827@N00/4686679997
